about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Software Developer with over 5 years of experience specializing in web development. I'm passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems. My expertise includes front-end technologies like React and TypeScript, as well as back-end technologies including Node.js and databases.
details: 5+ years of professional experience in software development
Strong expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript
Experience with Node.js, Express, and RESTful API design
Collaborative team player with excellent communication skills
